Sentencas: A novel solid-oxide-fuel-cell-based cooling, heating, and power (CCHP) system integrated chemical looping hydrogen generation is proposed, in which the chemical looping hydrogen generation realizes the high-efficiency CO2 capture and provides hydrogen to fuel cell, avoiding carbon deposition caused by the direct reaction of methane.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: The high-temperature solar heat collector is integrated to assist the fuel cell subsystem in achieving high-efficiency power generation and energy cascade utilization.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: The thermodynamic models of components are constructed, and the energy and exergy performances under the design conditions with or without solar energy are compared and analyzed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: Through validating the thermodynamic models, the simulation results indicate that the energy and exergy efficiencies in cooling mode are 78.02% and 45.92%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: The energy efficiency in heating mode reduces by 5.08%, while the exergy efficiency increases by 0.67%.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: The CO2 capture rate of the proposed system reaches 99.96% and the CO2 purity is about 99.59%.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: The energy consumption of CO2 capture in the proposed system reduces by 69.37% compared to the conventional system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: The sensitivity analysis of key parameters such as fuel cell operating temperature and direct normal irradiance on system performances are performed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: The results show the total energy and exergy efficiencies can be improved by properly increasing the SOFC operating temperature.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation

Sentencas: Although the energy and exergy efficiencies slowly drop with the increasing direct normal irradiation, the energy output increases by 6.10% and 4.95% in cooling and heating mode from 500 W/m(2) to 1000 W/m(2), respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of fuel-cell-based combined cooling, heating, and power system integrated solar energy and chemical looping hydrogen generation
